Long-term animal study show concern drug polymer coat DYNALINK-E - everolimus tissue concentration drop quantifiable limit approximately 17 month implant , vascular response coat normal widely patent lumen strut incorporated vessel tissue . The safety performance DYNALINK-E substantiate clinical pre-clinical data , clinical data similar product . DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Study Dynalink®-E Everolimus Eluting Peripheral Stent System
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective , Non-Randomized , Single-arm , Multi-center , Clinical Study Evaluate Safety Performance Dynalink®-E , Everolimus Eluting Peripheral Stent System Treatment Atherosclerotic de Novo Restenotic Native Superficial Femoral Proximal Popliteal Artery Lesions .
